label: Become a Student in Social Hackers Academy and learn how to code!
caption:
Dear Student,
Thank you for choosing Social Hackers Academy to study and learn how to create websites and Internet Applications!
The class you are going to apply for will take place 3 afternoons/week, from 6-8 pm or 8-10 pm>/br>. You need to study, complete your homework, in order to graduate! Our teachers will be always available for questions you might have and support you in the lessons!
Now, you need to enter your personal information, in order to enter the platform to complete your application.
Good luck!
